page.title: 20DOMESDAY STUDY GROUP
page.content:
The members of Thurgarton W.I. who took part in collecting the data and writing the report for this block were: Kay Catherall June Stevens Margaret Whiteside Sheila Wilson and Anne Woolley.
The photographs were taken by Margaret Whiteside and Guy Woolley.
Our task was made more difficult than normal because of the geography of the block. The River Trent, while providing a topic of considerable interest, divides the block into two separate parts, a 25 mile round trip being required to get from one to the other!
